name: P20
prompt: Security camera footage from wall-mounted camera at corner of house, suburban home side yard with fence and gate at dusk. Fading natural light mixed with activated porch lights, long shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up, face obscured by hood, average build, moving with deliberate slow pace. They walk behind a large bush, disappearing briefly, then reappear continuing along the fence. Fixed camera position, medium field of view along property side, standard security camera lens, Transitional lighting quality, warm tones, automatic exposure adjusting. Realistic human motion, 20-second duration.
